original_text:
Hawaiian Fever Slot
Dal primo aloha al ronzio della notte hawaiana, rimarrai incantato da splendide ragazze hula che girano i rulli della slot online Hawaiian Fever e si espandono per eseguire la loro danza mentre lo speciale Expanding Wild, portando vincite incredibili ai fortunati. 

Questa è la nuovissima versione di Tom Horn Gaming, dalla grafica magistralmente progettata e il gameplay divertente. C’è una ricompensa potenziale massima fino a 1.860 volte la puntata, quindi continua a leggere questa recensione per conoscere tutti i dettagli.
Hawaiian Fever Slot: come si gioca  
In termini di modalità di gioco, la slot Hawaiian Fever ha un approccio piuttosto semplice. Il layout è composto da 3 file e 3 rulli, ma gli sviluppatori hanno incluso 27 possibili modi per vincere, una mossa interessante vista la griglia così ridotta. 

Per formare una vincita, 3 simboli corrispondenti devono atterrare su quelle linee di pagamento, a partire dal primo rullo a sinistra. Per quanto riguarda le opzioni di scommessa, la slot Hawaiian Fever include una vasta gamma di opzioni che possono adattarsi alla maggior parte dei tipi di giocatori. 

L’opzione di partenza è fissata a 0,20€, mentre la puntata massima possibile può essere 100€ per giro.
Tema e design
Il mood tipicamente hawaiano tropicale è perfettamente rappresentato sia nella grafica, che nella colonna sonora che riprende le musiche tradizionali dei luoghi. I rulli di legno della slot Hawaiian Fever sono al centro dello schermo e sullo sfondo appare un meraviglioso paesaggio con piante tropicali, capanne sulla spiaggia palme e le immancabili tavole da surf.
Simboli e payout 
I simboli hanno un design piuttosto caratteristico e la tabella dei pagamenti inizia con i 4 semi di carte di basso valore. Passando ai simboli più redditizi, c’è una bevanda all’ananas, una bevanda al cocco e infine una bevanda all’anguria che vale 25 volte la puntata per una linea di pagamento completamente coperta.
La ragazza hawaiana è il simbolo jolly del gioco che può espandersi e sostituire i normali simboli di pagamento nelle combinazioni vincenti. Il simbolo dell’Aloha fiorito invece è lo scatter e può essere utilizzato per attivare la funzione giri gratuiti.
L’RTP è nella media (95,04%), mentre la volatilità risulta alta, il che significa che i premi possono essere meno frequenti, ma considerevolmente più preziosi se arrivano. Questo modello è abbinato a un potenziale di vincita massimo fino a 1.860 volte la puntata.
Caratteristiche bonus presenti nel gameplay
Ora che abbiamo spiegato le basi, è il momento di esaminare le funzionalità bonus incluse nello slot Hawaiian Fever e come possono influenzare il gioco.

FUNZIONE WILD IN ESPANSIONE
Durante il gioco base, ogni volta che un simbolo jolly si ferma sui rulli e può prendere parte a una combinazione vincente, si espanderà. In tal caso, il simbolo jolly coprirà l’intero rullo, accompagnato da animazioni di danza e fiori;

FUNZIONE FREE SPIN 
Se riesci a ottenere 3 simboli scatter contemporaneamente, verrà attivato il round bonus Giri Gratuiti e ti verranno assegnati 10 FS mentre sullo sfondo potrai ammirare un meraviglioso tramonto.

FUNZIONE WAIKIKI RESPIN
Durante la funzione Giri gratuiti, l’atterraggio del simbolo speciale della ragazza hawaiana ti assegnerà un Waikiki Respin. Quel simbolo si espanderà per coprire l’intero rullo e sarà bloccato, mentre le altre posizioni ricominceranno a girare;

FUNZIONE GAMBLE
Dopo aver creato una combinazione vincente, puoi scegliere di scommettere con le vincite per avere la possibilità di aumentare il tuo bankroll. Dovrai indovinare correttamente il colore di una carta a faccia in giù e in caso di errore, il gioco verrà annullato.

Valutazione conclusive e verdetto
Se ami il mare e le destinazioni esotiche, la slot Hawaiian Fever può essere una fantastica esperienza di gioco in quanto combina una grafica eccellente e un gameplay semplice ma divertente. La scena hawaiana presentata con lo sfondo e i simboli è fantastica e le funzionalità bonus possono essere potenzialmente redditizie. 

Tuttavia, esiste un RTP inferiore alla media e il potenziale di vincita massimo può essere considerato relativamente basso per un gioco altamente volatile come questo. 

Se vuoi provare altri titoli di questo sviluppatore, ti suggeriamo di dare uno sguardo al nostro catalogo di slot gratis e scegliere la tua preferita oppure puoi provare la divertente Wheel of Fortune Hawaiian Getaway di IGT per un’altra vacanza all’insegna del relax!

Domande Frequenti 
Qual è il massimo potenziale di vincita della slot Hawaiian Fever?

Il massimo potenziale di vincita nello slot Hawaiian Fever può raggiungere fino a 1.860 volte la puntata.



Che tipo di bonus sono inclusi nella slot online Hawaiian Fever?

La slot Hawaiian Fever è dotata di Expanding Wilds, Waikiki Respins e un round bonus Free Spins che ti aiuteranno ad aumentare le potenziali vincite.



La slot Hawaiian Fever è mobile-friendly?

Sì, la slot Hawaiian Fever è stata realizzata da Tom Horn Gaming con tecnologia HTML5, che la rende compatibile con smartphone e tablet.

raw_translation.response:
Hawaiian Fever Slot:
From the first aloha to the buzz of Hawaiian nightlife, you'll be enchanted by the beautiful hula girls spinning the reels of Tom Horn Gaming's Hawaiian Fever online slot and expanding to perform their dance as the special Expanding Wild brings incredible wins to the lucky ones. 

With expertly designed graphics and entertaining gameplay, this brand new version is worth a try. There's a potential maximum reward of up to 1,860 times your bet, so read on for all the details.
How to Play Hawaiian Fever Slot  
In terms of gameplay, Hawaiian Fever slot takes a rather simple approach. The layout is made up of 3 rows and 3 reels, but the developers have included 27 possible ways to win, an interesting move for such a small grid. 

To form a win, 3 matching symbols must land on those paylines, starting from the leftmost reel. As for betting options, Hawaiian Fever slot includes a wide range of options that can suit most types of players. 

The minimum bet is set at €0.20, while the maximum possible bet can be €100 per spin.
Theme and Design
The typically tropical Hawaiian mood is perfectly represented in the graphics, as well as in the soundtrack that plays traditional music of the region. The wooden reels of the Hawaiian Fever slot are in the center of the screen, while the background features a beautiful landscape with tropical plants, beach huts, palm trees, and of course, surfboards.
Symbols and Payouts 
The symbols have a rather distinctive design and the paytable starts with the 4 lower-value card suits. Moving on to the more rewarding symbols, there's a pineapple drink, a coconut drink, and finally a watermelon drink that's worth 25 times the bet for a fully-covered payline.
The Hawaiian girl is the game's wild symbol, which can expand and replace the normal paying symbols in winning combinations. The Aloha flower symbol is the scatter and can be used to trigger the free spins feature.
The RTP is average (95.04%), while the volatility is high, meaning that prizes can be less frequent but considerably more valuable if they do come. This model is paired with a potential maximum win of up to 1,860 times your bet.
Bonus Features Present in Gameplay
Now that we've explained the basics, it's time to examine the bonus features included in the Hawaiian Fever slot and how they can affect gameplay.

EXPANDING WILD FEATURE
During the base game, every time a wild symbol lands on the reels and can take part in a winning combination, it will expand. In that case, the wild symbol will cover the entire reel, accompanied by dance animations and flowers;

FREE SPIN FEATURE
If you manage to get 3 scatter symbols at the same time, the Free Spins bonus round will be activated, and you will be awarded 10 FS while in the background you can admire a beautiful sunset.

WAIKIKI RESPIN FEATURE
During the Free Spins feature, the landing of the special Hawaiian girl symbol will award you a Waikiki Respin. That symbol will expand to cover the entire reel and be locked in place, while the other positions will start spinning again;

GAMBLE FEATURE
After creating a winning combination, you can choose to gamble your winnings for a chance to increase your bankroll. You'll need to correctly guess the color of a face-down card, and in case of an error, the game will be canceled.

Final Evaluation and Verdict
If you love the sea and exotic destinations, Hawaiian Fever slot can be a fantastic gaming experience as it combines excellent graphics and simple but entertaining gameplay. The Hawaiian scene presented in the background and symbols is fantastic and the bonus features can be potentially profitable. 

However, there is a below-average RTP and the potential maximum win can be considered relatively low for such a highly volatile game. 

If you want to try more titles from this developer, we suggest taking a look at our free slot catalog and choosing your favorite or trying the fun Wheel of Fortune Hawaiian Getaway by IGT for another relaxing vacation!

Frequently Asked Questions 
What's the maximum potential win in the Hawaiian Fever slot?

The maximum potential win in the Hawaiian Fever slot can reach up to 1,860 times your bet.

What type of bonuses are included in the Hawaiian Fever online slot?

The Hawaiian Fever slot is equipped with Expanding Wilds, Waikiki Respins and a Free Spins bonus round that will help you increase potential wins.

Is the Hawaiian Fever slot mobile-friendly?

Yes, the Hawaiian Fever slot was created by Tom Horn Gaming with HTML5 technology, making it compatible with smartphones and tablets.

Hawaiian Fever Slot

From the first aloha to the buzz of the Hawaiian night, you will be enchanted by the beautiful hula girls spinning the reels of the Hawaiian Fever online slot game while expanding wild, bringing incredible wins to the lucky ones.

This is the latest version of Tom Horn Gaming, with masterfully designed graphics and entertaining gameplay. There is a potential maximum reward of up to 1,860 times the bet, so keep reading this review to learn all the details.

Hawaiian Fever Slot: How to Play 

In terms of gameplay, the Hawaiian Fever slot has a rather straightforward approach. The layout consists of 3 rows and 3 reels, but the developers have included 27 possible ways to win, an interesting move given the reduced grid.

To form a win, 3 matching symbols must land on those paylines, starting from the first reel on the left. As for betting options, the Hawaiian Fever slot includes a wide range of options that can adapt to most types of players.

The starting option is set at €0.20, while the maximum bet possible can be €100 per spin.

Theme and Design 

The typical tropical Hawaiian mood is perfectly represented both in the graphics and in the soundtrack that picks up traditional music from the places. The wooden reels of the Hawaiian Fever slot are in the center of the screen and on the background there is a wonderful landscape with tropical plants, beach huts, palm trees, and the inevitable surfboards.

Symbols and Payout 

The symbols have a rather characteristic design and the payment table starts with the 4 low-value card suits. Moving on to the most lucrative symbols, there is a pineapple drink, a coconut drink, and finally a watermelon drink that is worth 25 times the bet for a fully covered payline. 

The Hawaiian girl is the game's wild symbol that can expand and replace normal pay symbols in winning combinations. The Aloha flower symbol is the scatter and can be used to activate the free spins feature.

The RTP is average (95.04%), while volatility is high, which means that prizes can be less frequent but considerably more valuable if they arrive. This model is combined with a maximum potential win of up to 1,860 times the bet.

Bonus Features in Gameplay 

Now that we have explained the basics, it's time to take a look at the bonus features included in the Hawaiian Fever slot and how they can influence gameplay.

EXPANDING WILD FEATURE 

During the base game, whenever a wild symbol stops on the reels and can take part in a winning combination, it will expand. In this case, the wild symbol will cover the entire reel, accompanied by dance animations and flowers.

FREE SPIN FEATURE 

If you manage to get 3 scatter symbols at the same time, the Free Spins bonus round will be activated and you will be awarded 10 FS while admiring a beautiful sunset in the background.

WAIKIKI RESPIN FEATURE 

During the Free Spins feature, landing the special Hawaiian girl symbol will award you a Waikiki Respin. That symbol will expand to cover the entire reel and will be locked, while the other positions will start spinning again.

GAMBLE FEATURE 

After creating a winning combination, you can choose to bet with your winnings to have a chance to increase your bankroll. You will have to correctly guess the color of a face-down card and if you make a mistake, the game will be canceled.

Final Evaluation and Verdict 

If you love the sea and exotic destinations, the Hawaiian Fever slot can be a fantastic gaming experience as it combines excellent graphics and simple but entertaining gameplay. The Hawaiian scene presented with the background and symbols is fantastic, and the bonus features can be potentially profitable.

However, there is an RTP below average and the maximum potential win can be considered relatively low for a highly volatile game like this.

If you want to try other titles from this developer, we suggest you take a look at our catalog of free slots and choose your favorite or try the fun Wheel of Fortune Hawaiian Getaway by IGT for another vacation in relaxation!

Theme and Design 

The typical tropical Hawaiian mood is perfectly represented both in the graphics and in the soundtrack that picks up traditional music from the places. The wooden reels of the Hawaiian Fever slot are in the center of the screen and on the background there is a wonderful landscape with tropical plants, beach huts, palm trees, and the inevitable surfboards.

Symbols and Payout 

The symbols have a rather characteristic design and the payment table starts with the 4 low-value card suits. Moving on to the most lucrative symbols, there is a pineapple drink, a coconut drink, and finally a watermelon drink that is worth 25 times the bet for a fully covered payline. 

The Hawaiian girl is the game's wild symbol that can expand and replace normal pay symbols in winning combinations. The Aloha flower symbol is the scatter and can be used to activate the free spins feature.

The RTP is average (95.04%), while volatility is high, which means that prizes can be less frequent but considerably more valuable if they arrive. This model is combined with a maximum potential win of up to 1,860 times the bet.

Bonus Features in Gameplay

EXPANDING WILD FEATURE 

During the base game, whenever a wild symbol stops on the reels and can take part in a winning combination, it will expand. In this case, the wild symbol will cover the entire reel, accompanied by dance animations and flowers.

FREE SPIN FEATURE 

If you manage to get 3 scatter symbols at the same time, the Free Spins bonus round will be activated and you will be awarded 10 FS while admiring a beautiful sunset in the background.

WAIKIKI RESPIN FEATURE 

During the Free Spins feature, landing the special Hawaiian girl symbol will award you a Waikiki Respin. That symbol will expand to cover the entire reel and will be locked, while the other positions will start spinning again.

GAMBLE FEATURE 

After creating a winning combination, you can choose to bet with your winnings to have a chance to increase your bankroll. You will have to correctly guess the color of a face-down card and if you make a mistake, the game will be canceled.
